meanings.definition: Toward the rear; in a backward direction.
meanings.sent1: She walked rearwards to get a better view of the sunset.
meanings.sent2: The car moved rearwards as it reversed out of the parking spot.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to walk rearwards but ended up looking quite confused.
meanings.sent4: His mind kept drifting rearwards to the memories of his childhood.
meanings.sent5: The idea of traveling rearwards in time fascinated him.

meanings.definition: In or toward the back or rear.
meanings.sent1: He placed the heavy box rearwards on the shelf to balance the weight.
meanings.sent2: The dog wagged its tail rearwards as it backed away from the stranger.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored its nuts rearwards in the tree trunk for safekeeping.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts always drifted rearwards to the peaceful countryside.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed rearwards, away from the bustling city.
